name: ENGINEERING ASSET MANAGER
description: Construction Cost Consulting Co. (NY, NY) seeks Engineering Asset Manager to manage engineering assets availability.  Develop and lead quality equipment strategies to optimize preventative maintenance of engineering equipment.  Deliver cost effective maintenance by using efficiency planning and scheduling processes, timely and effective repairs, and develop and manage fit for purpose asset strategies.  Ensure compliance with internal standards, policies, guidelines, and regulatory, code and legislative requirements.
location: 100 Park Avenue, 16th Floor, Suite 1, New York, NY 10017.
